text: 3.8 1 Ko 15.9-10, Gal 1.16, Epe 1.7, Kol 1.27, 1 Ti 1.13-15 God binɨb ne okok kɨli binɨb awl mɨdebal, yad bɨ tam nɨb okok tek mɨdebin ak pen, God yɨp yɨmug nɨŋɨd gɨtep gɨl agek, yad binɨb Juda mel okok kɨlop takaw teplep ak agñɨnɨg ajebin. Takaw teplep anɨb ak anɨgɨl mɨdeb, Klays binɨb okok kɨlop dɨtep yɨbɨl gup. Kɨlop dɨtep yɨbɨl gup anɨb ak, tap awl teplep yɨbɨl mɨdeb, binɨb okok kɨli nɨŋɨd bɨlok nɨgɨnɨgel tek ma lup.
